page.title: 07SOCIAL SERVICES - SICKNESS
page.content: WHO WILL HELP WHEN WE ARE ILL. Neither Ashburnham nor Bodle Street boasts a doctor,dentist,nurse or chemist.Doctor's surgeries are in Windmill Hill,Herstmonceux or Ninfield all several miles away from the villages.Our nurse is in Windmill Hill though 20 years ago a custom designed nurse's house complete with office/treatment room was built in Bodle Street.But soon "our" nurse had to serve another area and now she has retired and the house is up for sale. Our chemist is in Herstmonceux, and one doctor also dispenses but no-one delivers.Not a problem if you have a car.The nearest Dentist is Hailsham but there are also dentists in Battle, Bexhill and Eastbourne. A retired dentist who lives in Herstmonceux will visit you at home, if you need him.
